headline: Better Warren Buffett Stock to Buy for 2025: Coca-Cola vs. Domino's
summary: Warren Buffett is probably the most famous investor alive today, drawing followers who want to replicate his success.  Investors getting their feet wet in the stock market would do well to actually heed Buffett's advice and buy some of his favorites instead of betting on the next big tech stock.  Coca-Cola (NYSE: KO) is Buffett's longest-held stock and one of his favorites, while Domino's Pizza (NYSE: DPZ) is one of his newest holdings.

headline: Adobe price target lowered to $475 from $525 at UBS
summary: UBS analyst Karl Keirstead lowered the firm’s price target on Adobe (ADBE) to $475 from $525 and keeps a Neutral rating on the shares. The firm’s checks have signaled that the second half of 2024 and Coca-Cola’s (KO) AI-generated holiday ad may prove to be tipping points in terms of acceptance of AI-generated content, the analyst tells investors in a research note. While Coca-Cola and a previous AI-generated ad from Toys “R” Us did not use Adobe AI tools for the content creation, UBS says Adobe
